name: Frugal Fried Green Tomatoes
author: JONDEIK
summary: Cheapest way to make fried green tomatoes that are crunchy on the outside, and taste like apple pie on the inside. Great side-dish for any meal!
ingredients: ½ cup cornmeal, or as needed
6  green tomatoes, cored and cut into 1/16-inch slices
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Place cornmeal in a bowl; dip and coat each tomato slice until thoroughly coated
Place coated tomato slices side by side in the hot oil; fry until coating is browned and crusty, 1 to 2 minutes per side
Remove with a slotted spoon and transfer to a paper towel-lined plate to drain
Season with salt and black pepper
